data.title: Zekelman Industries
data.meta_description: Atlas Tube is a leading manufacturer of HSS, pipe piles, and specialty tubes in North America. Discover our wide range of high-quality products.
data.text:
Meet Atlas Tube

Founded by the late Harry Zekelman, Atlas Tube is the leading manufacturer of HSS, straight-seam ERW pipe piles and specialty tube in North America. With seven mills across the continent, we offer the largest size range and provide the best availability and service levels in the industry.

Atlas Tube rolls more than 1.2 million tons a year at seven facilities across North America.

Our factory in Blytheville, Arkansas, is the largest continuous electric resistance weld (ERW) tube mill in the world.

Atlas Tube introduced “Quick Change” technology to minimize cycle times, meaning delivery lead times of just 2–4 weeks, the shortest in the industry.

Our factories use a closed-loop system that continuously recycles the coolant we use, resulting in zero wastewater.

Products we make

Atlas Tube manufactures hollow structural sections (HSS), pipe piles, Shuriken® Better Bolted Connections and mechanical tubing in our state-of-the-art North American facilities.

Markets we serve

Atlas Tube’s 100% domestically made products are used in almost any type of construction project, including industrial, infrastructure, commercial, energy and transportation.

Get to know the people and products of Atlas Tube.
